column1: * 1955 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to David Masson (12 December 1955).
* 1964 - The tenth episode of the Princess-serialization of The Hobbit is published.
* 1972 - J.R.R. Tolkien (Writers for the 70s) is released.
* 2011 - The Lord of the Rings Online#Update 5: Armies of Isengard
column2: the fifth free update of The Lord of the Rings Online

column1: * 2012 - The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey is released in New Zealand.
* 2014 - The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies is released in the United Kingdom.
